import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Gets the data that makes up the specified attachment"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/attachments/{id}/data"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

Gets the data that makes up the specified attachment. The output is the raw binary data.

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"data":{"type":"string","description":"The binary data is output directly, not JSON."}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
